results.name: Denominator of 3/4 + 1/4 - 3/8 - 1/8 + 3/16 + 1/16 - 3/32 - 1/32 + 3/64 ...
comment: Denominator of partial sums of A112030(n)/A016116(n+4), numerators = A112031;
reference: G. Pólya and G. Szegő, Problems and Theorems in Analysis I (Springer 1924, reprinted 1972), Part One, Chap. 4, Sect. 1, Problem 148.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,2).
mathematica: LinearRecurrence[{0,2},{4,1},50] (* following conjecture in Formula field above *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 21 2014 *)
program: (PARI) m=50; v=concat([4,1], vector(m-2)); for(n=3, m, v[n]=2*v[n-2]); v \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 08 2018
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 27 2005
